Class ec.ezlib.prim.ObjectSugar 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ezlib.prim.ObjectSugar
public class ObjectSugar
extends Object
A sweetener defining extra messages that may be e-sent to any object.

call(Object, String, Object[])
Since this is explicitly invokable in EZ with calculated strings, it must intern the verb
isa(Object, Object)
order(Object, String, Object[], Resolver)
Why, you may think, do we still need an order() message when we've got poE? With this order message, if the first message throws a non-Ejection, then the successor messages are not delivered.
ping(Object, Object)
used for the equivalent of an ewhen closure

used for the equivalent of an ewhen closure

order 
 public static Object order(Object rec,
                            String nestedVerb,
                            Object nestedArgs[],
                            Resolver after) throws Exception, Ejection
Why, you may think, do we still need an order() message when we've got poE? With this order message, if the first message throws a non-Ejection, then the successor messages are not delivered. Instead of being forwarded, the 'after' Resolver is smashed with the first message's problem.

isa 
 public static boolean isa(Object rec,
                           Object type)
